episodeTitle: Why Your Website Is Losing You Clients
guestBio: Mike DeVries is a world-renowned realism tattoo artist based in Camarillo, California. A pioneer in color portrait tattooing, Mike has been featured on Ink Master and is known for pushing the boundaries of photorealism in skin art. He's also been an early adopter of TattooNOW's web platform, using it to drive consistent bookings.
talkingPoints:
Most tattoo studio websites look like they were built in 2012
Your portfolio page is not your homepage — stop treating it that way
Mobile-first isn't optional anymore — 78% of tattoo searches happen on phones
The 3-second rule: if visitors can't book in 3 clicks, you're losing them
SEO basics every tattoo artist should know but nobody teaches
